title: HYPERVENTILATION
description: Increase the amount of oxygen you consume per Time Track reset by 1.

title: MARKED BY FEAR
description: The horror you felt left a permanent physical mark on you. Whether it’s a twitchy eye, a shaky hand or a streak of white hair, the effects are visible (-1 CHA).

title: WEAKENED CONSTITUTION
description: The constant stress has left your heart weakened (-1 CON).

title: PARANOIA
description: You don’t really trust other people, and it shows (-2 Manipulation).

title: OVERLY CAUTIOUS
description: You know the horrors that are out there, and you are not going to rush into them. In solo play, +1 Time each time the Time Track is reset. In group play, always attack last.

title: DEATH WISH
description: Sick with stress and desperation, you just want it to be over. Rolling a 1–3 on a Recovery check means you give up and remain Knocked Down.

title: UNFOCUSED
description: You have problems focusing your attention on complicated tasks (-1 INT).

title: PHOBIC
description: Even the slightest shadow terrorizes you. Each time you gain Trauma, gain 1 extra.

title: DAMAGED MEMORY
description: The intense trauma has damaged your brain. Each time you earn XP, you earn ⅓ less (rounding up).

title: APATHETIC
description: You no longer feel the urge to fight for anything (-1 WIL).

title: APPREHENSIVE
description: You start doubting your combat capabilities (-2 to all Combat skills).

title: INSECURE
description: You are afraid to jump into the fray (-1 Initiative).

title: UNBELIEVER
description: It is difficult for you to see your destiny (re-rolls now cost 2 Luck points).

title: LET IT END
description: You are tired of trying and failing at life (+1 to incoming Injury rolls).

title: UNRELIABLE
description: You doubt your own skills and can no longer roll critical successes.

title: TIRED
description: Lacking the fighting capability you once had, standard attacks now cost 6 Stamina.

title: CARELESS
description: You don’t really want to be bothered by dodging attacks. Dodging costs 1 more Stamina.

title: CLUMSY
description: Your hands shake and you drop things easily. Perform DEX checks with Disadvantage.

title: FOGGY MIND
description: You can’t concentrate on tasks for long. Perform INT checks with Disadvantage.

title: MARKED
description: The darkness within calls the darkness without. Each Site has 2 additional Known Threats (pg 300). This is stackable if other characters are also marked.
